ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($User.BypassVR__c ) && ISCHANGED(PersonTitle) && $Profile.Name <> "ICON_Interface DREAM" && $Profile.Name <> "LV_Interface_Datastage" && $Profile.Name <> "LV Pass integration" && RecordType.Name ="Person Account" && NOT( IsProspect__pc ) && NOT( SPO_BypassVR__pc )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have the right to change Client's Title.
